explains: n. 拒绝，回绝；拒绝接受，拒绝给予；优先取舍权，优先购买权（first refusal）；选择权；（马）（对障碍物的）拒跳
wordGroup: first refusal 优先取舍权；优先取决运务

sentences.en: Her answer amounted to a complete refusal.
sentences.cn: 她的答复等于完全拒绝。

sentences.en: His refusal to talk was simple stubbornness.
sentences.cn: 他拒绝交谈只是出于固执。

sentences.en: His refusal to discuss the matter is very annoying.
sentences.cn: 他拒绝商量这件事，令人很恼火。
